articles.title: Man Utd 'unconvinced' by £43m star behind-the-scenes at Old Trafford - GIVEMESPORT
articles.description: Some of Manchester United’s hierarchy are not convinced by one of Erik ten Hag’s summer transfer targets as the Dutchman looks to turn things around at Old Trafford.
articles.content:
Manchester United target Pau Torres has not convinced some of the club’s hierarchy that he would be the right signing for the team, according to transfer insider Dean Jones.
